message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.DC, cs.SI, cs.NI. 

This paper deals with the construction of codes with local repair and local regeneration properties, which are relevant topics in information theory (cs.IT) and distributed systems (cs.DS). The paper also discusses the use of HashTag codes, which are a recent development in coding theory (cs.DC). The paper's focus on optimization metrics such as repair bandwidth, I/O operations, and access time suggests that it may also be relevant to systems and networking (cs.SI) and networking and internet architecture (cs.NI).
